name: Heat Flow
description:
Heat Flow is a strategy game where you build stacking towers and manage your engine's heat.

The main mechanic of the game is stacking modules and creating towers. Modules can affect each other and your heat levels. Each module has unique synergies with other modules which were inspired by games like Slay the Spire, SNKRX, and more.

Made for Ludum Dare 50 in 3 days

Salih Unal (Coding, 3D Art)

Oguzhan Kalkuz (Coding, Music)

Post-Jam Version Changes:

  •  Added Tutorial
  • Stopping time when you're in build mode
  •  Difficulty adjustments
  • Module stat adjustments
  • Bigger heat bar
  • Guarantee randomness system for module loots
  • Reduced stacked enemies destroy time
  • Some bug fixes
